price: (8) And remember the name of your Lord and devote yourself to Him with [complete] devotion.
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرِ ٱسۡمَ رَبِّكَ وَتَبَتَّلۡ إِلَيۡهِ تَبۡتِيلٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kuri is'ma rabbika watabattal ilayhi tabtīlan
